appInfo.name: Care Companion
appInfo.description: Revolutionary AI-powered care platform providing comprehensive cognitive support, mood tracking, and 24/7 companionship for Alzheimer's patients and their families.
appInfo.longDescription: Care Companion transforms Alzheimer's care through advanced AI technology, offering personalized cognitive training, mood tracking with empathetic responses, real-time health monitoring, and seamless family communication. Features include voice-powered AI companion, predictive health analytics, comprehensive medication management, emergency response system, and insurance coverage optimization.

features: Comprehensive Mood Tracking with Empathetic Responses
Advanced Cognitive Training and Memory Enhancement
Real-time Health Monitoring and Vital Signs Tracking
Emergency Response System with Family Notifications
AI Gaming Platform for Cognitive Enhancement
